column4: BRIEF-Bancorpsouth Bank To Acquire Icon Capital Corporation In Houston, Texas
column6: * UNDER TERMS OF MERGER AGREEMENT, BANCORPSOUTH BANK WILL ISSUE 4.1 MILLION SHARES OF BANCORPSOUTH BANK COMMON STOCK
column7: * CO WILL ALSO ISSUE $17.5 MILLION IN CASH, FOR ALL OUTSTANDING SHARES OF ICON CAPITAL CORPORATION CAPITAL STOCK
column8: * MERGER HAS BEEN UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY BOARDS OF DIRECTORS OF BOTH COMPANIES
column9: * BANCORPSOUTH- UPON COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, MARK REILEY WILL SERVE AS BANCORPSOUTH BANKâ€™S HOUSTON AREA CHAIRMAN
